title: Sharking
creator_credit: Educational Media Centre, RMIT, Terry Walker and Rod Rees
brief_description: A history of the shark and of shark fishing and marketing in Australia. Shows the historical development of the Australian shark industry and the detailed research and managemnet of shark fishing resources being carried out byy the Victorian Fisheries and Wildlife Department.
